dcterms:creator: Maxime Chevalier-Boisvert
Lucas Willems
Suman Pal
dcterms:description: The MiniGrid-Empty environment is characterized by a 147-dimensional vector observation and offers an action space comprising six actions, including turn left, turn right, move forward, pick up an object, drop the object being carried, and toggle. The agent learns to navigate to a goal while receiving rewards based on its actions.
dcterms:title: MiniGrid-Empty
